FuncDef:
The description command configures the description of a PW APS instance.
The undo description command deletes the description of a PW APS instance.
By default, the description of a PW APS instance is not configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description of the current PW APS instance.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
PW APS can be used to ensure the reliability of LDP, SVC, and PWE3 PWs. In PW APS networking, the PW APS instance status determines the protection switching in a PW protection group. A PW APS instance must be created first. To configure the description of a configured PW APS instance, run the description command.
Prerequisites
A PW APS instance has been created using the pw-aps command.
